caption.p: Antidepressant activity of MEHA on tail suspension ( A) and forced swimming ( B) tests in mice. Results are expressed in mean ± SEM. *** p < 0.001, significantly different from control; ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s test ( n = 3, per group). MEHA: methanol extract of Homalomena aromatica leaves; MEHA-200, methanol extract of H. aromatica 200 mg/kg; MEHA-400, methanol extract of H. aromatica 400 mg/kg; Reference drug imipramine hydrochloride (10 mg/kg).
